title: New: Wavering Hands – No Constant
content: Swiss outfit Wavering Hands aka Rolf Laureijs has just announced the details of his debut EP, I Remember Nothing, out 1 February on Oh Sister Records. No Constant, the first cut to be taken from said EP is a languid slice of Beach Fossils and Wild Nothing inspired dreampop, and whilst not breaking new ground, it’s a healthy indication of what’s to come from the young musician.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
